reviews.review: Good game, but sometimes makes me angry.
i recommend it but this game is accupied with cheaters and annoying russian kids
very quick way to learn russian
Don't just play the core game for thousands of hours. Surf, Bhop, jailbreak and all kinds of weird stuff instead. Use Source to its full potential to see the true beauty.

i have 3 accounts of csgo (total play time of 2k hours approx). gold nova in all of them. i only play solo queue. i have been getting master guardians (4 ranks above me), dmg, le and lem and even global elite (highest rank) ranked people for the last 4 months (actually even more than that). Every game there is a guy who is silver 1 or 2 or 3 (lowest rank) in our or enemy team. On top of that I get 5 man stack in enemy team very often (once every 4 games at least and keep in mind that the 5 man stack that are at least 4 ranks above me) even though i am solo queue. I thought it was the time when i played the game but no matter when i play the game same shit keeps happening. If u have money and u like to burn it and gamble it pls play csgo its the best game u will find for it but the actual game is horse shit noone cares about the match making, people queue match making so that they can trigger people and be annoying (no one gets banned btw). There are just too many things wrong with this gambling server which has a part time functionality of letting u play a fps game. There are more skins related updates than there are actual game play related updates. Just go play valorant or apex and if u insist on playing csgo then first download faceit or ECL. cs go is favourite place for hackers as there are pretty much 0 consequences for hacking. I can go on but theres no point just dont buy this crap.
